name: The Legend of Zelda: The Missing Link
overview:
Covering The Legend of Zelda: The Missing Link, a new fan-mod of Ocarina of Time. The game takes place after OoT & before the events of Majora's Mask. It features all new areas, custom code, plus a new & remixed musical score. Game created by Kaze Emanuar, CDi-Fails, and /Zel/.
